notify.string_to_short: The search string must be at least 3 characters long

about.title: About SimpleModDownloader
about.description: SimpleModDownloader is an application that allows you to download and install mods for Nintendo Switch games created by PoloNX.
about.thanks:
◆ Thanks to @nadrino for SimpleModManager
◆ Thanks to Natinusala and HamletDuFromage for borealis
◆ Thanks to Pikatsuto for the logo and SuperButterScotch for the typography
◆ Thanks to NicholeMattera for Simple-INI-Parser

label.no_games: No games found on the Switch
label.desc_install: To install mods, you need to use the SimpleModManager application created by @nadrino.
label.extract: Extraction is complete. To install the mod, go to the Installation tab.
label.restart_smd: Restart SimpleModDownloader to apply the update.
label.desc_smd: ◆ You can update the app you're using on your switch

crash.sd_full: The SD card is full. Please free up space and restart the application.
